channel.title: Dice Match (Mini Game) on Mini Games Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Dice Match (Mini Game) on Mini Games Hub

item.title: About Dice Match
item.description:
%title%

The objective here, is to roll the dice, which contain two numbers, each ranging from 1 to 6. If the two numbers match, you'll earn money equal to 0 to 20 times their total. For example, if the numbers are 5 and 5, their total is 5 + 5 = 10. If the multiplier is, say, you got 15 by luck, you'll receive 150, which is 15 times the total.

item.title: Shortcodes of Dice Match
item.description:
%title%

  • Escape: Quits the game. On Android, click back button.
  • Spacebar: Rolls the dice. On Android, double tap with 1 finger.
